tool.name: LAMMPS simulation
tool.command: ln -s $graph_pb graph.pb && ln -s $mof_data mof.data && lmp -in $input && mv dump.2 $dump && mv log.lammps $log

param.name: graph_pb
param.label: machine learning force field file (e.g., graph.pb from DeePMD)

tool.help:
To use the MD trajectory for subsequent INS simulations, the following format is required (where A B C are the element symbols):
dump 1 all custom 1 lammps.dump id element x y z
dump_modify 1 element A B C
